00114 #define N_CHANNEL 2
00115 
00116 struct {
00117    short demand[N_CHANNEL];
00118    float temp[N_CHANNEL];
00119    float c_prop[N_CHANNEL];
00120    float c_int[N_CHANNEL];
00121    float p_int[N_CHANNEL];
00122    float power[N_CHANNEL];
00123    short ofs[N_CHANNEL];
00124    unsigned short period;
00125 } idata user_data;

00186 /********************************************************************\

00188   Application specific init and inout/output routines

00192 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant;
00193 
00194 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00195 
00196 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00197 {
00198    unsigned char i;
00199 
00200    AMX0CF = 0x00;               // select single ended analog inputs
00201    ADC0CF = 0xE0;               // 16 system clocks, gain 1
00202    ADC0CN = 0x80;               // enable ADC
00203 
00204    REF0CN = 0x03;               // enable internal reference
00205    DAC0CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC0
00206    DAC1CN = 0x80;               // enable DAC1
00207 
00208    PRT1CF = 0xFF;               // P1 on push-pull
00209 
00210    if (init) {
00211       for (i = 0; i < N_CHANNEL; i++)
00212          user_data.power[i] = 0;
00213 
00214 #ifdef PID_CONTROL
00215       for (i = 0; i < N_CHANNEL; i++) {
00216          user_data.demand[i] = 0;
00217          user_data.c_prop[i] = 1;
00218          user_data.c_int[i] = 0.1;
00219          user_data.p_int[i] = 0;
00220          user_data.period = 60;
00221       }
00222 #endif
00223    }
00224 }
00225

00230 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00231 {
00232    if (index);
00233 }

00235 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00236 
00237 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00238 {
00239    if (index);
00240    return 0;
00241 }
00242 
00243 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00244 
00245 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00246 {
00247    /* echo input data */
00248    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00249    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00250    return 2;
00251 }
00252 
00253 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00254 
00255 void adc_read()
00256 {
00257    static unsigned char channel = 0;
00258    static unsigned long value;
00259    static unsigned char cnt = 0;
00260    unsigned char i;
00261    float t;
00262 
00263    if (cnt == 0) {
00264       /* switch to new channel */
00265       channel = (channel + 1) % N_CHANNEL;
00266       AMX0SL = channel & 0x0F;
00267       ADC0CF = 0xE0 | (GAIN & 0x07);    // 16 system clocks and gain
00268 
00269       value = 0;
00270    }
00271 
00272    /* integrate 16 times */
00273    for (i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
00274       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00275 
00276       ADCINT = 0;
00277       ADBUSY = 1;
00278       while (!ADCINT);          // wait until conversion ready, does NOT work with ADBUSY!
00279 
00280       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00281 
00282       value += (ADC0L | (ADC0H << 8));
00283       yield();
00284    }
00285 
00286    cnt++;
00287 
00288    if (cnt == 0) {              /* average 16*256 = 4096 times */
00289       value /= 256;
00290 
00291       /* convert to volts, times two (divider), times 100deg/Volt */
00292       t = value / 65536.0 * 2.5 * 2 * 100;
00293 
00294       /* correct offset */
00295       t += user_data.ofs[channel] / 100.0;
00296 
00297       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00298       user_data.temp[channel] = t;
00299       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00300    }
00301 }
00302 
00303 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00304 
00305 unsigned char cycle;
00306 unsigned char ca[N_CHANNEL];
00307 
00308 void set_power(void)
00309 {
00310    static unsigned long on_time, last_time;
00311 
00312    unsigned char i;
00313    float frac;
00314    unsigned long expired;
00315 
00316    /* only process each 10ms */
00317    if (time() == last_time)
00318       return;
00319 
00320    last_time = time();
00321 
00322    /* turn output off after on-time expired */
00323    for (i = 0; i < N_CHANNEL; i++)
00324       if (user_data.power[i] < 100) {
00325          expired = time() - on_time;
00326          if (expired >= (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i])) {
00327             frac = user_data.power[i] - (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i]);
00328 
00329             if (frac == 0 || expired >= (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i]) + 1) {
00330                P1 &= ~(1 << i);
00331             } else if (cycle > 0) {
00332                if ((float) ca[i] / cycle > frac) {
00333                   P1 &= ~(1 << i);
00334                } else {
00335                   ca[i]++;
00336                }
00337             } else {
00338                ca[i]++;
00339             }
00340          }
00341       }
00342 
00343    /* turn all outputs on every second */
00344    if (time() - on_time >= 100) {
00345       last_time = on_time = time();
00346       for (i = 0; i < N_CHANNEL; i++)
00347          if (user_data.power[i] > 0)
00348             P1 |= (1 << i);
00349 
00350       cycle = (cycle + 1) % 10;
00351 
00352       if (cycle == 0)
00353          for (i = 0; i < N_CHANNEL; i++)
00354             ca[i] = 0;
00355    }
00356 }
00357 
00358 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00359 
00360 #ifdef PID_CONTROL
00361 
00362 void do_control(void)
00363 {
00364    unsigned char i;
00365    float p;
00366    static unsigned long t;
00367 
00368    if (user_data.period == 0)
00369       return;
00370 
00371    /* once every specified period */
00372    if (time() > t + 100 * user_data.period) {
00373       t = time();
00374 
00375       for (i = 0; i < N_CHANNEL; i++) {
00376          /* integral part */
00377          user_data.p_int[i] +=
00378              (user_data.demand[i] - user_data.temp[i]) * user_data.c_int[i];
00379          if (user_data.p_int[i] < 0)
00380             user_data.p_int[i] = 0;
00381          if (user_data.p_int[i] > 100)
00382             user_data.p_int[i] = 100;
00383          p = user_data.p_int[i];
00384 
00385          /* proportional part */
00386          p += (user_data.demand[i] - user_data.temp[i]) * user_data.c_prop[i];
00387 
00388          if (p < 0)
00389             p = 0;
00390          if (p > 100)
00391             p = 100;
00392 
00393          user_data.power[i] = ((int) (p * 10 + 0.5)) / 10.0;
00394       }
00395    }
00396 }
00397 
00398 #endif
00399 
00400 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00401 
00402 void user_loop(void)
00403 {
00404    /* read temperature */
00405    adc_read();
00406 
00407 #ifdef PID_CONTROL
00408    /* do regulation */
00409    do_control();
00410 #endif
00411 
00412    /* set output according to power */
00413    set_power();
00414 }
